p: Patients were entered into the Markov model at the statuses “SVR12—non-cirrhotic”, “SVR12—cirrhotic”, “non-SVR12—cirrhotic”, or “non-SVR12—non-cirrhotic”. In the BGW study cohort, approximately 17.2% of patients were identified as being in a cirrhotic status before treatment and therefore entered the Markov model at this stage.
